snippet.title: [PREVIEW] PS2 - Angel's Feather: Kuro no Zanei (HD, 60FPS)
snippet.description:
This is first 10 minutes of Angel's Feather: Kuro no Zanei for Playstation 2.

If you like and enjoy our video you can buy us a coffee.
https://ko-fi.com/kawaiigames
DONATIONS: https://streamlabs.com/kawaiigamesie

Angel's Feather is a Japanese boys' love visual novel game created by BlueImpact, which was originally released on April 25, 2003 for PC, and later ported to the Playstation 2 by HuneX as Angel's Feather: Kuro no Zanei. In 2006, it was adapted into an OVA, which was animated by Studio Venet. The game's character designer is Yamamoto Kazue. In 2007, Media Blasters licensed the anime for Region 1 release.

KURO NO ZANEI:
Angel's Feather Kuro no Zanei: An explosion happens in the dojo Shou went to before. Shou, who was taking a break from school, happened to meet the "brother next door" there, Kimura Kaoru, who he had learned kendo together with.

Shou was happy to see "Kaoru-san" again, whom he longed after in olden days. But Kaoru...---
Shou caught a cold. Is the cold medicine that Kai made for him suddenly making him grow dog ears?!
There is a quarrel between the brothers, a long desired reunion, and a story with a comedic touch unfolds on the stage of Yuusei Academy. This is an addition to the original story of Angel's Feather.

The limited edition comes with a drama CD and a special booklet. (Source: PsxDataCenter)

Angel's Feather: Kuro no Zanei
Developer: HuneX
Publisher:  GN Software
Platform: Playstation 2, PS2
Release: 30 June 2005

Follow KAWAII GAMES here:
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/kawaiigamesie
